name: The Last Directive
description:
Story:
Humans died a long time ago, and the world is now dominated by bots and war machines that carry out orders that have been programmed over decades.

Shelia and her brother Norman the two androids who have been tasked with finding an ORB, which is said to hold the last human DNA remnants. The ORB, however, is guarded and monitored in a hidden tower, and the mission is not simple.

Perhaps you can save humans once more and give them a second chance. Assist Shelia and her brother in carrying out the last directive order!

Control:
[Z] Jump
[X] Shoot
[C] Dash

Gamepad and Mac Keyboard is also suppored.

Info:
Our submission for Godot Wild Jam 46; we hope you all enjoy it!

Credit:
Lead Developer: QatariGameDev
Support Developer: Mikado069
Sprites Artwork: QatariGameDev
Character Design: Erie
Musics: EienNoBeginner

Special Thanks to @SpaceCrescent team for the logistic support.
